overview: Rogers and Collins work for the Workload Employment Agency. Rogers is the manager and is having difficulty with his typewriter. The repairman, Lee Stern, comes for the repair. When Rogers sees the repairman's tool, he decides to show off his own and the size of his screwdriver is bigger than huge!  Collins is the employment counsellor. He sets the stage for the dance auditions. He auditions Ryan and Blade. Andrew Ryan is first. He is a hot and sexy man who knows what he wants. Blade is shy but real cute and during his audition Collins pays full attention to the moves as he makes some moves of his own.  Ryan is sent out on a temporary job. He soon finds himself at the home of Mr. Rogers. The action that takes place there is one of the hottest you'll ever see!
title: Workload
